comment._content: Russell William Ford (April 25, 1883 in Brandon, Manitoba, Canada – January 24, 1960 in Rockingham, NC) was a baseball pitcher during the dead-ball era of the early 1900s. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Ford
